Package org.ginsim.core.graph

Interface GraphModel<V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - type for vertices
    E - type for edges
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicGraph, Graph<V,​E>, HierarchicalTransitionGraph, ReducedGraph<AG,​AV,​AE>, RegulatoryGraph, TransitionGraph<V,​E>, TrapSpaceInclusionDiagram, Tree
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDerivedGraph, AbstractGraph, DynamicGraphImpl, HierarchicalTransitionGraphImpl, ReducedGraphImpl, RegulatoryGraphImpl, TransitionGraphImpl, TrapSpaceTreeImpl, TreeImpl
    public interface GraphModel<V,​E extends Edge<V>>
    Handle the basic structure of a graph. This provides methods to:
    • add and remove vertices and edges
    • get the list of existing vertices and edges
    • some simple graph operations (shortest path, connected components)
    • Handle some basic metadata: graph name and annotation
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi, Lionel Spinelli

      • getGraphName

      • setGraphName

        void setGraphName​(String graphName)
           throws GsException
        changes (if success) the name associated with this graph. By default only valid xmlid are accepted.
        Parameters:
        graphName - the new name.
        Throws:
        GsException - if the name is invalid.

        List<E> getShortestPath​(V source,
                        V target)
        Find the shortest path between the two given vertices
        Parameters:

        target - the node at the end of the searched path
        Returns:
        the list of edges composing the shortest path

        Build a graph from the provided vertices and edges based on the current graph
        Parameters:

        edges - the collection of edges used to create the subgraph
        Returns:
